Language will be applied to across the a: Language will be applied to across the app
Max number of tasks in today: Max number of tasks in today
Please fill out the following info: Please fill out the following info
Short description: Short description, e.g. where you are from
Tasks visible in today subtitle: This is the amount of tasks shown by default in today group for all projects.
Users in the sidebar body: This is the amount of users shown by default in sidebar under the task section.
Goals in all projects body: This is the max amount of goals shown by default under all project section.
Chats in all projects body: This is the max amount of chats shown by default under all project section.
Date format will be applied to across th: Date format will be applied to across the app
Theme that will be applied to across the: Theme that will be applied to across the app
Notification email subtitle: Email to be used to send all email notifications from Alldone
Select the ways Alldone will notify you: Select the ways Alldone will notify you.
Email notification description: Alldone will send you notifications to your preferred email about the items you follow.
Push notification description: You will receive actual push notifications in your devices about the items you follow.
WhatsApp notification description: Get WhatsApp messages for important updates you follow.
anonymous sidebar body: Alldone is your personal productivity tool helping you get the most out of your life. Simply sign in via Google and come back to this link to start using/editing this content right away!
Select a color for your project: Select a color for your project
Add skills to journal the progress: Add skills to journal the progress
nothing to show header: Ups, looks like there is nothing to show over here
statistics filter description: Filter the statistics by time period. This will be used to filter the statistics shown in top bar tags info as well.
Custom date range subtitle: Select a start and end date to show that range of statistics
Shows the keyboard shortcuts cheat sheet: Shows the keyboard shortcuts cheat sheet.
Sets focus to the search field: Sets focus to the search field.
Opens the Add new item in any focused li: Opens the Add new item in any focused list view.
Opens pop-up to create a Google Meet roo: Opens pop-up to create a Google Meet room.
Goes up and goes down respectively: Goes up and goes down respectively.
Focus to sidebar with All projects secti: Focus to sidebar with All projects section selected.
cus to projects sidebar on the left: cus to projects sidebar on the left.
cus to elements on the right excluding t: cus to elements on the right excluding the sidebar.
Activates primary button in any pop-up/d: Activates primary button in any pop-up/dialog window.
Checks the first task checkbox from the: Checks the first task checkbox from the open task list.
Toggles among Open, Workflow and Done: Toggles among Open, Workflow and Done.
Selects below/above task with edit mode: Selects below/above task with edit mode active when there is a task selected on edit mode previously.
The following shortcuts are available on: The following shortcuts are available only when the task is on edit mode. Hints can be seen by pressing Alt key.
Opens the pop-up to set reminder: Opens the pop-up to set reminder.
Rejects a task from Workflow pop-up: Rejects a task from Workflow pop-up.
Creates a follow-up task from a task in: Creates a follow-up task from a task in done section.
The following shortcuts are available on: The following shortcuts are available only when the new goal is on edit mode. Hints can be seen by pressing Alt key.
Opens the pop-up to assign capacity plan: Opens the pop-up to assign capacity planning.
Opens the pop-up to change the progress: Opens the pop-up to change the progress of the goal.
The following shortcuts are available on: The following shortcuts are available only in the note list. Hints can be seen by pressing Alt key.
Opens the pop-up to make the note sticky: Opens the pop-up to make the note sticky.
The following shortcuts are available on: The following shortcuts are available only when the note is on edit mode. Hints can be seen by pressing Alt key or Ctrl key.
Adds a task within the note: Adds a task within the note.
Inserts an image within the note: Inserts an image within the note.
Opens text color predefined styles selec: Opens text color predefined styles selector.
Opens text highlight color predefined st: Opens text highlight color predefined styles selector.
The following shortcuts are available on: The following shortcuts are available only when the new person is on edit mode. Hints can be seen by pressing Alt key.
Opens the pop-up to enter the person inf: Opens the pop-up to enter the person information.
Opens the pop-up to upload the person av: Opens the pop-up to upload the person avatar.
The following shortcuts are available on: The following shortcuts are available only when an object is in edit mode. Hints can be seen by pressing Alt key.
Opens a pop-up for adding a linked task: Opens a pop-up for adding a linked task to the object.
Toggles the object between Followed and: Toggles the object between Followed and Not Followed.
The following shortcuts are available on: The following shortcuts are available only when an update is in edit mode. Hints can be seen by pressing Alt key.
Attach a file to the update: Attach a file to the update.
Free, but limited usage description: The usage of Alldone.app is free for light/fair usage with all features. We want you to be able to experience the full Alldone.app experience. If you then decide to use Alldone.app more, we would like you to upgrade to premium below. There are limits on your overall user account and on individual projects. Whenever you hit one of the limits first, you need to upgrade to premium.
Usage limited by our fair use policy (nu: Usage limited by our fair use policy (number of tasks & traffic).
App usage in current month from XP quote: App usage in current month from %{xpQuotaLimit} XP quote
By doing this, the user will lose all th: By doing this, the user will lose all the premium features when the paid period ends.
Selected projects to be under premium su: Selected projects to be under premium subscription
Selected users to be under premium subsc: Selected users to be under premium subscription
selected with unique users selected Mont: selected with %{users} unique users selected Monthly payment %{price} EUR
This address is optional but will be inc: This address is optional but will be included in the invoice sent via email,
Please enter your whatsapp number includ: Please enter your whatsapp number including your country code
Be careful, this action is permanent: Be careful, this action is permanent
Do you really want to perform this actio: Do you really want to perform this action and loose the data entered till now?
Do you really want to perform this action and lose the premium status?
Do you really want to delete this accoun: Do you really want to delete this account?
Cancel Premium plan description: By canceling you will lose your premium privileges, but only when the paid period ends. Now you keep the premium status till
Create a company with premium projects: Create a company with premium projects
Create a company with premium users desc: Upgrade to premium subscription to use Alldone heavily and get the most out of the tool.
Upgrade other users to premium subscript: Upgrade other users to premium subscription to use Alldone heavily and get the most out of the tool.
1 GB traffic per month (normal use means: 1 GB traffic per month (normal use means you wont notice it)
Full access to past tasks & search histo: Full access to past tasks & search history
Check info before activating the subscri: Check info before activating the subscription
Check info before payment description: Here you can take a look to what you are going to pay for monthly, if during a month some of this info change, the invoice will be updated automatically and you will be notified.
Check info before edit payment users des: Here you can see the details and changes that will be applied to the list of premium users you pay for. Keep in mind that if you have added new users you will have to pay for their premium status for this month, but only the days remaining until the end of the month will be charged.
Check info before activating the subscri: Here you can see the details before activating the the subscription. Keep in mind that if you have added new users you will have to pay for their premium status for this month, but only the days remaining until the end of the month will be charged.
new selected users to pay SINGULAR: %{usersAmount} new selected users to pay. Expected monthly payment: %{amountToPay} EUR including VAT.
new selected users to pay PLURAL: %{usersAmount} new selected users to pay. Expected monthly payment: %{amountToPay} EUR including VAT.
selected users to pay SINGULAR: %{usersAmount} selected users to pay very month. Expected monthly payment: %{amountToPay} EUR including VAT.
selected users to pay PLURAL: %{usersAmount} selected users to pay very month. Expected monthly payment: %{amountToPay} EUR including VAT.
Expected monthly payment: EUR including: Expected monthly payment: %{price} EUR including VAT.
By canceling this payment you will not: By canceling this payment you will not
lose the company you have created, it wi: lose the company you have created, it will kept as inactive, so if you want to activate it later it will be there
XP and or Traffic quota reached: XP and or Traffic quota reached
Please just wait until next month or upg: Please just wait until next month or upgrade to Premium.
Please just wait until next month or upgrade the project to Premium
Sorry, this feature is only available fo: Sorry, this feature is only available for premium users, please upgrade to premium to get the full potential of Alldone
XP and or Traffic quota percent reached: XP and or Traffic quota %{percent} % reached
Upgrade to Premium and forget about limi: Upgrade to Premium and forget about limits.
Upgrade the project to Premium and forge: Upgrade the project to Premium and forget about limits.
XP gained compared with limit in freemiu: XP gained compared with limit in freemium
Please just wait until next month to ref: Please just wait until next month to refill the quota
The address is optional, but will be inc: The address is optional, but will be included in the invoice sent via email. The image is used as visual identifier.
Billing info description: All this information is optional, but will be included in the invoice sent via email.
Name: Name
Select the projects you want to be inclu: Select the projects you want to be included in the premium subscription.
Select the users you want to be included: Select the users you want to be included in the premium subscription.
Select your interaction with this projec: Select your interaction with this project
Here a quick summary of how you have bee: Here a quick summary of how you have been doing.
but since we are offline right now we do: .. but since we are offline right now we don't know ;)
You are almost there, the goal is clean: You are almost there, the goal is clean up your inbox
Some good progress but try reaching empt: Some good progress but try reaching empty inbox!
Looks like you had no time to clean your: Looks like you had no time to clean your inbox
Congrats - you have reached empty inbox: Congrats - you have reached empty inbox across all your projects.

There are not projects to show here: There are not projects to show here.
Type to suggest a new task: Type to suggest a new task
Choose the goal to link this task: Choose the goal to link this task
Choose the goal to link this task descri: Select here, from the list of your assigned goals, the one to which this task will be linked and grouped under its header. Click the goal item again to unlink it.
There are not results to show: There are not results to show.
Select which tools the assistant can use: Select which tools the assistant can use
Select here the assignee subheader: Select here the assignee. If the assignee is not a project member, then the assigner will be taken as observer by default to keep track on the task and show it in his board at least.
Select here the assignee and observers s: Select here the assignee and observers. If the assignee is not a project member, then at least one observer is needed.
Select a date to postpone this goal and: Select a date to postpone this goal and its tasks.

Ups, feature not available description: Sorry, but for security reasons the screen recording feature have been disabled on mobile devices. The good news is you can still use this on not mobile devices.
Do you really want to cancel the screen: Do you really want to cancel the screen recording and lose the video?
Here you can select which webcam and mic: Here you can select which webcam and mic to use
No webcam available. Try giving camera a: No webcam available. Try giving camera access to Alldone from your browser.

Select what to do description: By stop observing, this task will not be shown in this board. The workflow it will take is the assignee's one if you move it.
Select the date for the Follow-up: Select the date for the Follow-up
Suggested by description: By accepting, this task will be added to the selected assignee open board and by moving it to Done, it will go to the selected assignee Done section.
Add task to update Goals weekly: Add task to update Goals weekly
You can add goals to define a roadmap &: You can add goals to define a roadmap & milestones together with your project.
Select a project to start adding goals: Select a project to start adding goals.
Write the title of the milestone: Write the title of the milestone
Select the date to postpone the mileston: Select the date to postpone the milestone
Select the date range to organise: Select the date range to organise
All of this milestone and later: All of this milestone and later
Mark as done for all users: Mark as done for all users
Mark Milestone as done description: By marking this milestone as done, its 100% goals will be moved to the done section. The goals which are not at 100% completed will be automatically extended to the next milestone. All goals from all users in this milestone will be affected (%{amount} goals). Are you sure you want to performs this action?.
Available capacity per project member fr: Available capacity per project member from today to the due date of the milestone
It is automatically calculated but you c: It is automatically calculated but you can adjust to account for holiday / sickness etc.
Milestone capacity view info: Looks like the goals on this milestone do not have assignees. Assign them and those assignees will appear here with their capacities respectively.
How many days are left from today?: How many days are left from today?
Select here the workstream this goal wil: Select here the workstream this goal will be linked to
Goals progress locked description: Once goals reach the Done status, its progress cannot be changed in order to track the amount of work done till the date it was moved to this section. You can however always reopen the milestone and then you can also change the goal progress as you please
Not enough points description: You need at least 1 point for create a new skill
Write the title of the goal: Write the title of the goal
Write the title of the skill: Write the title of the skill

Kicking this user will remove all conten: Kicking this user will remove all content created by the user in the project.

Phone format description: Enter your number in any format (e.g. 0179 1234567 or +49 179 1234567). It will be automatically formatted with country code.

if you want to edit User workflow steps: if you want to edit %{user} workflow steps for %{project} project
Alldone is online again, all functionali: Alldone is online again, all functionalities are available.
Edition in notes will be disabled till A: Edition in notes will be disabled till Alldone goes back online again.
This Object hasn't any note yet descript: Starting a new note will create it under this %{object}, and inherit all its properties like title and privacy. Also, the note will appear as a normal note in the main list of notes.

By saving, the current state of this not: By saving, the current state of this note will be saved as a version in history.
Select a version to recover description: The versioning only recovers the note content, so other properties stays unchanged. Also, objects like tasks within the note will be recovered, but with their current status.
Heading: Heading
List of all the users editing this note: List of all the users editing this note
Select who will review the step: Select who will review the step

Note successfully React, see it directly: Note successfully %{react}, see it directly in the %{open}
Looks like this note is really big alrea: Looks like this note is really big already.
Note size limit reached Description: As a way to keep the app usage smooth, Alldone recomends to have a limit of 100Kb in notes, please try to create a new one or clean up a little of this.
Looks like this project does not exist: Looks like this project does not exist.
Choose what people with the project link: Choose what people with the project link can do
People can join the project and edit: People can join the project and edit
People can view and duplicate the projec: People can view and duplicate the project

Google calendar account description: This account is being used to sync events from Google calendar and create task accordingly in Alldone app
Google gmail description: This will used to check the unread mails from Google Gmail account from Alldone app
Calendar connection moved description: This Google Calendar account (%{email}) was already connected to another project. It has been disconnected there and connected here.
Failed to connect calendar. Please try a: Failed to connect calendar. Please try again.
Failed to connect Gmail. Please try agai: Failed to connect Gmail. Please try again.
Type an email to send invitation: Type an email to send invitation
Write the title of the workstream: Write the title of the workstream
Default workstream to gather general pro: Default workstream to gather general project tasks
Default workstream to gather general tea: Default workstream to gather general project tasks
Duplicate project description: By duplicating the project you will get your own duplicate to do with it whatever you want. Choose below what type of objects you want to copy.
Duplicate project description2: The duplication will happen in the background and you will get an email when it is ready.
Duplicate project description3: To duplicate the project you must be an authenticated user of Alldone. Log in or sign up first and come back here then to duplicate the project.
Copy Tasks description: All non-private tasks from all the project's users will be assigned to you.
Copy Goals description: The goals will be duplicated and placed in the Backlog milestone, and the tasks will be grouped accordingly.
Copy Notes description: All non-private notes without its version history. Some tasks references and comments may be removed.
Copy Contacts description: The contacts of the project will be duplicated except the private contacts and the real users.
This object owner set privacy to Private: This object owner set privacy to Private.
Ups, looks like the owner of this resour: Ups, looks like the owner of this resource set it to Private, so you can't see it.
Project duplication description: The duplication of the following project has been finished. Reload the app to get the new project and its content.
Project DV anonymous description: In this view you can see all relevant detail of this project. To check the tasks shared through the workstream boards just go to the Workstream tab and navigate using the Open button.
Choose the type of estimation to use in: Choose the type of estimation to use in this project
Estimates will be based on points: Estimates will be based on points
This currency will be used for displayin: This currency will be used for displaying total earnings across all projects
Estimates will be based on minutes, hour: Estimates will be based on minutes, hours, and days
Enter the number of days, hours, and/or: Enter the number of days, hours, and/or minutes for the estimation
Select chart description: Select the statistic chart for showing below
Here you can see how much hours you have: Here you can see how much hours you have logged by project
Here you can see how much points you hav: Here you can see how much points you have logged by project
Here you can see how much tasks you have: Here you can see how much tasks you have done by project
Here you can see how gold points you hav: Here you can see how gold points you have earned by project
Here you can see how XP you have earned: Here you can see how XP you have earned by project
You need to select a project to generate: You need to select a project to generate an invoice
You need to select a project to go there: You need to select a project to go there
Enter your own Invoice Information: From: Enter your own Invoice Information
Who this invoice should go to: To: Who this invoice should go to
Please enter the address of who you want: Please enter the address of who you want to send the invoice to.
Legal disclaimers info 1: Please enter the information you want on the generated invoice. We will create a Google Doc so you can later change all the info you want. All Information is optional but will be saved for next time you want to generate an invoice.
Legal disclaimers info 2: Alldone simply creates a template in Google Docs for the invoice. It is your responsibility to check it and change according to your needs. Alldone takes no responsibility.
Select the hourly rate per user: Select the hourly rate per user
Allows you to select the users you want: Allows you to select the users you want to see the statistics
Push notifications are not supported: Push notifications are not supported on your current device, but you can still change your settings to continue receiving them on other registered devices
Push notifications are disabled: Push notifications are disabled in your current browser, check it to receive notifications
Just like in real life you gain experien: Just like in real life you gain experience points when you do things on Alldone.
Earned skill points description: With these skillpoints you can now level up the skills in your profile to journal your progress in your life & career and negotiate better next time with your client or boss.
Invoice description: For our services between the %{startDate} and %{endDate} we are invoicing the following:
Please pay the invoice within 14 days: Please pay the invoice within 14 days.
This invoice does not need a signature: (This invoice does not need a signature)
Upgrade to premium to search for done ta: Upgrade to premium to search for done tasks >14 days
The project must have only one user to b: The project must have only one user to be able to transform in a template. Please kick the rest of the users and try again.
Select the community project that users: Select the community project that users will join.
Caution AI description: Conversation with an assistant is activated. The assistants are using the AI from OpenAI in the background. Please watch out that this AI can be wrong so please check everything she says. Alldone takes no responsibility.
Explain it like I am five: Explain it like I am five
You have run out of gold description: You have run out of gold and you need gold to use the assistant. Get gold by completing tasks or with the premium subscription.
Using the Alldone Assistant will cost go: Using the Alldone Assistant will cost Gold based on how much you chat
A monthly bonus: 1000 Gold per month, e.g. to chat with assistants & more
Act as a very good and experienced trans: Act as a very good and experienced translator to translate the following into %{language}:
Act as an experienced professional to ch: Act as an experienced professional to change the writing style of the following to more funny:
Summarize the following text for me into: Summarize the following text for me into 1 short paragraph of text:
Act as an expert in the topic: Act as an expert in the topic: %{objectName}. Think about a the most important questions for the topic and test me on the subject like a good teacher would do. Ask one question at once. Then wait for my answer and correct my answer. Only then move on to the next question.
Act as a very good teacher: Act as a very good teacher who can explain any concept in simple terms so that even a 5 year old could understand it. The topic is: %{objectName}.
Act as a creative person: Act as a creative person with an IQ of 120. Please give me a list of 10 ideas around the topic: %{objectName}.
You need to select a default project: You need to select a default project
You cannot do this action since you alwa: You cannot do this action since you always need to have a least one active project
Percent for receive a comment when creat: Percent for receive a comment when create an object
Percent chance to select a random task f: Percent chance to select a random task from someday when starting a new day
Your account has some active templates: Your account has some active templates and it is not possible to delete your user. Please, send an email to %{email} to discuss the issue.
This template has some active guides: This template has some active guides and it is not possible to kick this user because is the creator. Please, send an email to %{email} to discuss the issue.
This user is the guide creator and canno: This user is the guide creator and cannot leave the guide
Unlock these tasks with Alldone Gold: Unlock these tasks with Alldone Gold
Unlock modal description: Every month you get 100 free Gold. You can earn more Gold for free by completing tasks or by chatting in the community. Or simply upgrade your account to Alldone Premium to get 1000 free Gold / month & more.
Not enough Gold description: You currently do not have enough Gold to do this action. But don't worry it's easy to get more Gold:
Earn gold option 1: â€¢ Earn free Gold by completing tasks
Earn gold option 2: â€¢ Receive free Gold by chatting actively in the community
Earn gold option 3: â€¢ Get 100 free Gold / month for free or even 1000 free Gold / month with Alldone Premium

onboarding_connect_calendar_desc: Connect your calendar so I can help you prepare for meetings and manage your schedule.
onboarding_share_location_desc: Share your location so I can help you with location-based tasks.
onboarding_morning_reminder_desc: Do you want me to remind you every morning with the most important task of the day?
onboarding_connect_gmail_desc: Connect your email so I can help you draft replies and organize your inbox.
onboarding_enable_push_desc: Get notified when important tasks are due or when your assistant has an update for you.
onboarding_whatsapp_success_desc: Please check your WhatsApp. Anna just sent you a message!
You can now attach audio files to your n: You can now attach audio files to your notes using the attachment button on the keyboard
